review_title: cannot play game wont even start
one_reviews_text: bought the game downloaded it starts at tutorial and thats all .cant even get out of it much less play the game. might be a fun game if they can fix it so people could play it (update on game got to work im going to give it 4 stars not bad controls take some getting use to but in all not a bad game for the money)

review_title: Tries to hard to be Arizona Sunshine.
one_reviews_text:
1st Impressions Video with Commentary // Oculus Rift S // GTX 1060 (6GB):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fH9-h2SSef8

My Initial Thoughts:
I feel like this game is trying to be Arizona Sunshine, but never really hits the mark. Graphics are plain and simple, animations feel a bit broken,  but combat feels OK.
I noticed lots of lag in the controls when trying to teleport and after playing games like Saints & Sinners, I feel really spoiled now and indie developers really have a hard bar to reach.
